TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Windows.Forms.Button

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Word 文档的 Windows 窗体按钮。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms button that can be added to a Microsoft Office Word document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于。The is different from a . 具有其他成员，使其能够添加到 Word 文档并，为其提供的其他方法和属性。The has additional members that enable it to be added to a Word document and that give it additional methods and properties. 不要使用构造函数来创建一个新。Do not use the constructor to create a new . 使用方法将添加一个新到文档。Use the method to add a new to a document.

span.span: Activates the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加两个控件添加到文档，然后以编程方式使用激活第一个按钮方法。The following code example adds two controls to a document and then programmatically activates the first button by using the method. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles Anchor { get; set; }

summary.span: 获取 的下边缘与该文档的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets the distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the document.

value.span: 以磅为单位的下边缘之间的距离和文档的上边缘。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值等于的总和属性值和属性值。The value of this property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas the property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates the property of the control. 该示例将添加两个控件分别命名为`sizeButton`和`locationButton`到文档。The example adds two controls named `sizeButton` and `locationButton` to a document. 当`sizeButton`单击时，和，以便该按钮将更改大小调整属性。When `sizeButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes size. 当`locationButton`单击时，和属性调整，以便该按钮将更改位置。When `locationButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes location. 修改每个按钮后，该示例显示新， ， ， ，和的消息框中单击的按钮的属性值。After each button is modified, the example displays the new , , , , and property values of the clicked button in a message box. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls/CS/ThisDocument.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordWindowsFormsControls/VB/ThisDocument.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

summary.span: 从该文档中删除动态创建的 并将其从 中移除。

span.span: Deletes a dynamically created from the document and removes it from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只应该用于，在运行时以编程方式创建。This method should only be used with a that is created programmatically at run time. 如果在调用此方法引发异常，在设计时添加到文档。An exception is thrown if you call this method on a that is added to the document at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了将自身删除，当用户单击它时的控件。The following code example demonstrates a control that deletes itself when the user clicks it. 事件处理程序按钮调用方法来删除的按钮。The event handler of the button calls the method to delete the button. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对所做更改并属性值将导致属性值为更改。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the to change. 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates the property of the control. 该示例将添加两个控件分别命名为`sizeButton`和`locationButton`到文档。The example adds two controls named `sizeButton` and `locationButton` to a document. 当`sizeButton`单击时，和，以便该按钮将更改大小调整属性。When `sizeButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes size. 当`locationButton`单击时，和属性调整，以便该按钮将更改位置。When `locationButton` is clicked, the and properties are adjusted so that the button changes location. 修改每个按钮后，该示例显示新， ， ， ，和的消息框中单击的按钮的属性值。After each button is modified, the example displays the new , , , , and property values of the clicked button in a message box. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. span.span: Gets the underlying of the .
The underlying of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够获取该文档上的控件的准确位置。The property enables you to get the exact position of the control on the document. 如果该控件的换行样式未设置为**与文本对齐**，则属性返回`null`。If the wrapping style of the control is not set to **In line with text**, the property returns `null`.
